html2wiki-desc: Import HTML content into your wiki
html2wiki-summary: Description appearing on top of [[Special:Html2Wiki]] - but it's not.
html2wiki-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the Html2Wiki extension.
html2wiki-intro: Use this form to import HTML content into your wiki
import-html-text: Nominate your HTML source content. Future versions may allow for importing directly via URL.  Currently, you must have saved HTML locally on your computer
import-html-not-allowed: Sorry, you must be an Admin, or have import privileges to use this form.
log-description-html2wiki: Below is a list of the most recent HTML imports
